A new dad with a severe facial disfigurement has defended his decision to have a baby daughter with the same condition, despite cruel jibes from neighbours.

Simon Moore, 30, has Treacher Collins Syndrome – which is characterised by craniofacial deformities such as the absence of cheekbones.

He is also profoundly deaf and spent much of his childhood indoors to escape
